longBio:
Benthos are making their mark in the world of experimental progressive metal, hailing from Milan, Italy. Blending intricate elements of prog metal and mathcore, the band creates a sonic universe where precision collides with unpredictability, and melody crashes into madness. For those who crave music that’s crushing, unhinged, and unapologetically heavy, Benthos offer a relentless sound that shifts effortlessly between chaotic passages and stunningly ethereal interludes. Constantly evolving, their work is a journey into uncharted territory, driven by a pursuit of a unique sound.

Formed in 2018, Benthos quickly made an immediate impact on the Italian metal scene, opening for The Contortionist in 2019. Their debut album II introduced their blend of intricate rhythms and dynamic guitar work, earning praise from metal and progressive communities worldwide.

Benthos' live shows are as captivating as their music—hypnotic, schizophrenic, and intense. After their 2022 The Essence Tour, the band took their electrifying energy to the main stage of Dissonance Festival 2023, alongside industry heavyweights Meshuggah, Soen, and Destrage. A high-definition recording of this performance is available on YouTube.

2024 marked a major turning point for Benthos as they joined the roster of Century Media’s Inside Out Music. Their sophomore album, From Nothing, is set for release on April 11, 2025. This ambitious 12-track record, mixed by Federico Ascari and mastered by Tony Lindgren at Fascination Street Studios, explores humanity’s positive and negative imprints on society over time.

From Nothing includes the exploratory track “Fossil”, the first single released, which showcases the band’s distinctive, dynamic sound across its impressive six minutes. The album’s title track, “From Nothing”, is rooted in poetic lyrics that evoke the turbulent flow of existence - from the highs of ecstasy and the depths of pain to the profound beauty that connects them all. Lyrically, the album serves as a reminder of the power of ideas to shape our world and the legacy we leave in our search for meaning.

Across its 12 tracks, Benthos’ sound remains in constant evolution, marked by a refined dynamism and an unwavering pursuit of a unique musical language. With this boundary-pushing approach, Benthos continue to carve out their identity in the progressive metal landscape and beyond, inviting fans to dive deep into an ever-evolving sonic universe.

albumConcept:
From Nothing is a profound reflection on the meaning of life and the legacy humanity has forged throughout history. The album explores the positive and negative imprints left by humankind, and how they have shaped entire societies in various aspects – artistic, cultural, and social.

The title, From Nothing, encapsulates the sudden realisation of an idea and how it is capable of influencing the world around us, manifesting in both love and hate, discovery and regression. Time serves as a crucial guide in the evolution of human existence, with Benthos delving deep into how its passage impacts our achievements and failures.

Throughout the album, the band examines the intricate interplay between our creations and destructions, offering a nuanced commentary on humanity’s collective journey.

From Nothing serves as a reminder of the power of ideas to shape our environment and the enduring legacy we leave behind in our ongoing quest for meaning and understanding.

pressQuotes.quote: We are delighted to welcome Benthos to the InsideOutMusic family. Their modern and daring approach to music caught our attention and we are looking forward to developing this young ambitious band!
pressQuotes.author: Thomas Waber

pressQuotes.quote: They are one of the true revelations of the day. The band [...] immediately displays exceptional talent, born from the remarkable skills of the musicians involved and an uncommon taste that seamlessly blends modern progressive metal with a decadent post-rock. They create a succession of rich and emotionally impactful sonic nuances. Benthos manage to destabilize and surprise the audience with rhythm and vocal changes in a highly original emotional crescendo. The unreleased songs they present hint at great things for the band’s future in the world of music recording.
pressQuotes.author: Metal Hammer

pressQuotes.quote: The bar is set very high with this album. [...] These are probably such creative minds who walk around with a note and a pen in order to be able to write down all song ideas immediately.
pressQuotes.author: Time For Metal

pressQuotes.quote: I’ve found myself drawn back again and again to these tracks and am sure many of you will feel the same after you give it a go.
pressQuotes.author: Metal Trenches

pressQuotes.quote: Benthos set an exclamation point in the international progressive metal scene with II. With a flawless sound, innovative ideas and familiar aspects, the Italians have proven that they can also compete on an international level.
pressQuotes.author: MoreCore.De

pressQuotes.quote: Exploring the outer fringes of musical convention and coming dangerously close to redefining the concept of progressive metal, a bold new player emerges from the Italian peninsula with a short yet gargantuan stylistic excursion of a debut.
pressQuotes.author: Sonic Perspective

pressQuotes.quote: Benthos represent a high-level band with great potential, certainly attentive to every little detail, as the album cover unmistakably testifies. It is not common to listen to a debut album of this caliber, and this represents an excellent starting point to appreciate an Italian band that has all the elements to continue impressing the listener.
pressQuotes.author: True Metal

pressQuotes.quote: I was absolutely stricken when I discovered Benthos. [...] Benthos, if we’re all lucky enough, will have a proper chance to bloom into what could be one of the finest bands on the prog metal scene. [...] Honestly ’II’ basically fulfills the entire checklist for a record that’s not only very relistenable, fresh, and packed, but also highly promising.
pressQuotes.author: Scene Point Blank

pressQuotes.quote: Curiosity, desire to experiment, deep admiration towards the founders of that genre of metal that goes from progressive to ambient and post rock: these are the ingredients that led to the birth of the debut album by the Milanese band Benthos. And they want to reiterate that they are original by naming the first album ’II’.
pressQuotes.author: Metal Italia
